Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> @Captain BTCP paid Binance (or a similar exchange) I think $100K USD to list them. They delisted them a year later for not making them enough money

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <Captain> How can you make more money when the price is going down?

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> just a little historical tidbit

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> @Captain study how complex this website is: https://whattomine.com

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> @Captain let's turn it around: "How do you think miners make money?"

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> your question makes no sense to me

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> MINERS DO NOT BUY COINS

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> Price, who cares?

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> it's all about difficulty to mine

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <Captain> mine hush and "sell it"

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> miners do not buy coins

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> So price going "down", that doesn't matter. Because miners don't buy coins

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <Captain> I know, the difficulty increases with the mining load

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> Here is an example

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> profit can only be calculated when a miner sells

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> the "price" of the coin, for the last week while you are mining it, is completely and utterly NOTHING

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> Yet, most people use that number as their "profit"

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> the price when you sell it, is all that matters

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> so, if difficulty drops MUCH MORE than price

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> miners make more money

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> if that is weird, it's because you are not a miner

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <Captain> it is not weard.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> this doesn't even take into account wild BTC/fiat stuff. You can denominate profit in sats or fiat

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> and yes, even more complex, you could be making profit in fiat and losing money in sats, and vice versa

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> gosh, and this is #general

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <Captain> I totally get it. But we are in a low liquidity situation. We cannot deny that.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> you keep making different wrong statements

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> can't keep up

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> now you speak of liquidity, yes

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> paying for liquidity, it doesn't work

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> exchanges are just scams

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> CEXs, anyway. I highly encourage using AtomicDEX

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <Privatoshi> You pay $50k and you get no return

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <Privatoshi> You pay for the ability to be allowed to buy your own coin and sell it

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <Privatoshi> You can't recoup that money

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> Now you might see why this statement required a rebuttal 😅 `what if price will never increase. Mining will become not profitable. Miners will leave.`

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <Privatoshi> The tech is what gives a project value

Author: Gateway#3763

Content: [dscrd-hush] <Captain> The tech is good, the idea is good. But if nobody buys it. It's still worth nothing...

Content: [dscrd-hush] <Privatoshi> With an exchnge listing like the one you want, that makes it -$50k
